parameter.value: Como vai |PLAYERNAME|? Eu vou bem, obrigado, afinal, vendo rings. Diga {trade} para conferir.
ring of the sky,2123,10000; gold ring,2179,10000;
ring of healing,2214,10000;energy ring,2167,30000;time ring,2169,50000;life ring,2168,25000;stealth ring,2165,100000;dwarven ring,2213,200000;
